people_research_agent.description: A people research agent that searches for information about a person and uses reflection to ensure comprehensive data collection. The agent iteratively searches for professional information including years of experience, current company, role, and prior companies, using a reflection mechanism to determine when sufficient information has been gathered.

metadata.name: people-research-agent
metadata.description: Researcher agent that searches information about a person and returns it in a structured format with reflection-based iteration
metadata.author: Vadym Barda, Isaac Hershenson
